dialogue.1:
Found me you have! Hehehe... I was once a young 
adventurer like you. Many wares I have gathered 
from my travels over the years!
dialogue.2:
Say, I have just the offer for you... 

Bring me 5 gold coins and that rusty thing you call 
a sword, and I shall give you a much better weapon that 
has never failed to keep me safe.

responses.1: Have you brought what I asked?
responses.2: You've done it! Here you go!
responses.3: Bye! I didn't want to help you anyway

dialogue.1:
You must hurry to Langtoft Village to save 
your sister!
dialogue.2:
The forest route lies to the North, the mountainous 
route to the South. Please hurry!

responses.1:
Have you retrieved the potion for your 
sister?
responses.3: Her death will be on your hands...

dialogue.1: Your sister is too weak to talk right now.

responses.1: Your sister is too weak to talk right now.

dialogue.1:
Welcome, I am the Potion Seller, and I know what it is 
you seek... For my creations are the strongest potions 
known to man.
dialogue.2:
But I warn you - nothing in life is free, and my goods and 
services must carry a cost.
dialogue.3:
Bring me a shrub- er, ahem. Let me try that again. 

If you possess the trinket I seek, or will part 
with 10 gold coins, you shall have the potion you need.

responses.1:
Do you want one of my potions? 

It will cost the trinket.. or 10 gold coins, your choice.
responses.2:
Splendid! Take care, child. My potions will surely kill 
all but those with the utmost need.
responses.3: Come again if you change your mind.

dialogue.1:
"The bridge is out! The bridge is out!" they exclaim, 
and to that I say "Who needs bridges!?"
dialogue.2:
Behold! I am the Potion Seller's brother - Notion Seller! 
And I am here to sell you the notion that you don't need 
a bridge to cross a river!
dialogue.3:
That's right, for only 3 gold coins you can have the power 
of teleportation! 

For I have set up invisible runes on the 
blown out bridge remnants that, when someone holding an 
attuned gemstone steps on, will teleport you safely across!

responses.1:
What do you say? 

Do you want to buy an attuned gemstone??
responses.2: Perfect! Another happy customer - here you go!
responses.3:
No? Come find me when you no longer wish to attune 
your face to the river's rapids.
